description: The env_nvram.sh script uses the readycloud_nvram command to set multiple NVRAM variables related to the ReadyCloud service, including URL paths and service configuration parameters, and commits the changes via readycloud_nvram commit.
code_snippet:
readycloud_nvram set readycloud_fetch_url="https://readycloud.netgear.com/device/entry"
readycloud_nvram set readycloud_hook_url="https://readycloud.netgear.com/device/hook"
readycloud_nvram set readycloud_upload_url="https://readycloud.netgear.com/directio"

description: The set_nvram.sh script directly uses the nvram command to configure the runtime parameters and port settings for the leafp2p service, and commits the changes via nvram commit.
The func.sh script retrieves the GUI_Region variable via the /bin/config command to determine the webpage language settings.

The remote.sh script utilizes the /usr/sbin/nvram command to manage the complete configuration of the leafp2p service, including system paths, URLs, debug levels, and multiple other parameters, while providing default values when variables are unset.
